column4: hello. when i want to burn an .iso file in doesn't work. i wanted to create a file image with CD/DVD Creator but when i'm copy the file and click 'write to disc' it'll open a dialog with 'from image' and 'file' and when i hit from image i don't get nothing
just right-click the actual ISO file, select "burn to disc" - no need to use the cd/dvd creator
